DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine absolute bioavailability YH4808 use simultaneous oral therapeutic- [ 14C ] -labeled intravenous microdoses .
DOC.brief_title: Absolute Bioavailability YH4808 With Accelerator Mass Spectrometry ( AMS ) -Based Microdose Study
DOC.criteria: healthy male subject age 20 45 screening subject weight 55 kg BMI range 20.0 25.0 subject decide participate voluntarily write informed consent form subject clinically significant disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinological , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological ( central nervous system ) , psychiatric disorder malignant tumor clinically significant allergic disease ( except mild allergic rhinitis ) subject determine eligible screen test ( medical history , physical examination , 12lead ECG , laboratory test , etc ) within 28 day study start subject consider unsuitable inclusion investigator
